an4.90:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hoti appattamanaso, anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamano viharati.
an4.90:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanamacalo hoti.
an4.90:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi viharati:
an4.90:3.3: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
an4.90:3.7: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti;
an4.90:3.8: no ca kho attha vimokkhe kayena phusitva viharati.
an4.90:3.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanapundariko hoti.
an4.90:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi viharati:
an4.90:4.3: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
an4.90:4.7: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti;
an4.90:4.8: attha ca vimokkhe kayena phusitva viharati.
an4.90:4.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanapadumo hoti.
an4.90:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo samanesu samanasukhumalo hoti?
an4.90:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yacitova bahulam civaram paribhunjati, appam ayacito …pe… mameva tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti.
an4.90:5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
